data.title: My Blog
data.meta_description: SPEAK WITH AN ALTURA ACCOUNT MANAGER TODAY!(800) 654-0715    CONTACT US FORM
data.text:
Avaya designs, builds, deploys and manages video conferencing networks for enterprises. Avaya acquired Radvision’s market leading Scopia mobile video solution in 2012. Customers range from small businesses and nonprofit agencies up to more than 90% of the companies in the Fortune 500, as well as the U.S. government. Avaya is a world leader in reliable, secure networks that facilitate customer relationships, enhance productivity and maximize profitability.

Polycom with two decades of innovation in video conferencing and collaboration, and over 800 technology patents that underline our mission to push the greatness of human collaboration forward. We create amazing solutions and innovative user experiences that help millions around the world solve complex problems, generate new ideas, gain deeper understanding, offer assistance, protect the planet, and save lives.

Vidyo is changing the way people connect. We have moved the business model for video conferencing beyond expensive legacy hardware and dedicated networks to provide a powerful, flexible and scalable software-based solution that is also affordable. For organizations that need high quality video conferencing and want to avoid burdening their IT staff and resources, VidyoCloud is a hosted video collaboration solution that provides the highest quality available in any network environment.

Yealink is a global leading unified communication (UC) solution provider that primarily offers video conferencing systems and voice communication solutions. Founded in 2001, Yealink leverages its independent research and development and innovation to pursue its core mission: “Easy collaboration, high productivity.” The company’s high-quality UC solutions enhance the work efficiency and competitive advantages of its customers in over 100 countries. Yealink is the world’s second-largest SIP phone provider.
